name: Pur Manual Breast Pump
description:
PUR Manual Breast Pump BD is a convenient and time-saving way to store breast milk. It also helps mothers worry about the amount of milk that may not be sufficient when breastfeeding. In addition, in the event that the mother is busy or has to work outside the home The person in charge of taking care of it can feed the child immediately. It is important for mothers to learn how to pump and store milk. This ensures that your baby is receiving quality milk. And it is also good for the mother’s breast health as well.

Features of Manual Breast Pump

  • Equipped with silicone liner which provides comfort during pump
  • Effective
  • Durable
  • Long-lasting
  • Easy to clean
  • Teat for feeding is a standard neck comfort flow silicone nipple

name: Pur Microwave Sterilizer Set
description:
• Can hold 4 wide neck and 7 standard neck bottles – 2 different inserts.
  • Contains a set of tweezers for easily removing the bottles when they are hot.
  • Compatible with all microwave ovens.
  • Transparent to ensure hygienic cleaning.
  • Compatible with all Pur bottles except gripper and twisted gripper bottles and 10oz./300ml. Bottles.

name: Pur Nasal Aspirator
description:

name: Pur Silicone Tooth Brush
description:
• PUR Silicone Toothbrush in Bangladesh specially designed for a simple and effective start towards good oral hygiene.
  • Transparent to ensure a hygienic cleaning.
  • It cleans your baby’s mouth and tongue thoroughly.
  • Made from high-quality silicone which is not harmful.
  • Soft bristles, gentle on baby’s gums and teeth.
  • Does not cause oral irritation.
  • The brush is translucent, easy to check it’s cleanliness.
  • No smell and taste, easy to clean, and can be steamed.
  • Soft and gentle on baby’s gums and oral cavity.
  • Clear color for hygiene and easy to check the cleanliness.
  • No harm to babies, non-toxic, and free from nitrosamines.
  • Easy to clean and sterilize.

name: Pur Medicine Nurser
description:

  • Composed of silicone teat to ensure baby takes liquid drug easily.
  • Comes with transparent case for hygiene.

  • Easy to take apart and re-assemble.
  • Break resistant and can be sterilized repeatedly.
  • Made of high quality plastic and silicone material
  • Teat is volatile and nitrosamine safe.

name: Pur Silicone Breast Shields-M. (2pcs)
description:
• Designed to prevent sore or cracked nipples during breast feeding and provide hygiene protection during nursing.
  • Sterilizing case allows sterilizing before use.

name: Pur Washable Breast Pads (4pcs)
description:
• Prevents clothes from getting stained from breast milk leakage.
  • Fits comfortably and discretely into bra.
  • Curve to the contour of the breast for close fitting, discrete and natural comfort.
  • Can easily be washed and reused.
  • Easy to use & comfortable.
  • Made from high quality cotton.

name: Pur Nipple Puller
description:
It is a simple tool to help nipples temporarily stand out so that it is easier for the baby to establish a good latch, the first step to a successful breastfeeding experience. Our PUR Nipple Puller BD helps to pull out the nipple and suitable for mothers with blindness. To help make breastfeeding even easier – Helps pull out the nipple suitable for mothers with blind spots. – Easy to use.

Features

  • Nipple Puller for flat or inverted nipples.
  • helps breast feeding by mildly drawing out flat or inverted nipples.
  • Simple, effective, and easy to use with one hand.
  • BPA Free

How to Use

  • Wash hands and Nipple Puller.
  • Place the shield section directly over and around the nipple.
  • Press bulb, push the shield down making an air-tight seal and release the bulb. Repeat until the nipple is fully extended before breast feeding baby.
  • Always start using a Breast Pump before the baby is born. This will help keep the nipples in a condition that is ready to feed the baby.
